venue.address_1: Folly Bridge, St Aldates, Oxford, Oxfordshire, OX1 4LB
venue.name: Head of the River

results.description:
Don't worry if the website "says" that just 8 people are atttending. Rarely people confirm that they are coming. Usually there are 30-40 people every Wednesday. You will not be alone. You will meet new people. That's a given :)

WHY?
A meet-up for people who want to improve their Spanish,  their English or just make new friends.

WHAT TIME?
18:30pm to 19:30pm people usually speak Spanish.
19:30pm onwards. people usually speak English.

WHERE?

Head of the River. St Aldate's Pembroke Street, St. Aldates OX1 4LB Oxford

ORGANIZER
You can consult any issue with me either by phone [masked]) or email ([masked])

ADVICE
Be open-minded, not to be afraid to make mistakes and... most importantly, drink a beer, it normally helps to start talking!! And the most important: ENJOY ^_
results.how_to_find_us: Either look for me (have a lok at my profile picture) or ask the waiters
results.name: The Oxford Spanish Language Exchange Meetup

group.name: The Oxford Spanish Intercambio Meetup Group

results.description:
Only 20 places for this event. 

Every Wednesday is Spice Time at the Oglivy in Woking! You have a choice of Curry and a drink for only £7.25 


Also a Quiz at 7:00pm!!

If spicy food is not your thing? Your welcome to still choose something from the everyday pub menu. 

For more information on the Menu, I've attached the Website <a>www.theoglivy .co.uk</a> 

I will reserve us a large table for 20 people. 

Please only RSVP if your 99% Positive you can attend this mid week event. 

I will email everyone attending closer the time of the event. 

Put the 4th March in your diary, and do not double book yourself!!! 

Only 20 places going on the table. 

See you at 6:30pm to order food - 7:00pm quiz time!! 

David
results.how_to_find_us: Meeting inside Oglivy 6:30pm. I will email out my mobile number 24hrs before event to everyone attending.
results.name: Spice Night & Quiz @ The Oglivy!

group.name: Girls in the 'burbs (Camberley and surrounding are

results.description:
An Improv workshop. A fun and friendly place to learn how to think, speak and act spontaneously. You don't need any experience in acting, comedy or anything else to come to our sessions..

Sessions are £5 (£3 for students).

My number is[masked] if you need to call me.
results.name: Improvised Comedy Workshop

group.name: Improv workshops with Oxford Comedy Deathmatch

meta.description: Searches for recent and upcoming public events hosted by Meetup groups. Its search window  is the past one month through the next three months, and is subject to change. Open Events is optimized to search for current events by location, category, topic, or text, and only lists Meetups that have **3 or more RSVPs**. The number or results returned with each request is not guaranteed to be the same as the page size due to secondary filtering. If you're looking for a particular event or events within a particular group, use the standard [Events](/meetup_api/docs/2/events/) method.
meta.title: Meetup Open Events v2
